title: Stylus Smart Contract Deployment Guide
description: Step-by-step guide to deploy your Freelance Escrow contract to Arbitrum Stylus

steps.title: Install Stylus CLI
steps.description: Install the Stylus CLI tool for deploying Rust contracts

steps.title: Check Your Contract
steps.description: Verify your contract compiles correctly for Stylus

steps.title: Deploy to Arbitrum Sepolia (Testnet)
steps.description: Deploy to testnet first for testing
notes: Replace <YOUR_PRIVATE_KEY> with your actual private key
Make sure you have Sepolia ETH for gas fees

steps.title: Deploy to Arbitrum One (Mainnet)
steps.description: Deploy to mainnet when ready for production
notes: Ensure thorough testing on testnet first
You'll need real ETH for mainnet deployment
Consider using a hardware wallet for mainnet

integration_steps.title: Update Contract Address
integration_steps.description: After deployment, update CONTRACT_ADDRESSES in lib/smart-contracts.ts with your deployed contract address

integration_steps.title: Verify Contract
integration_steps.description: Verify your contract on Arbiscan for transparency and easier interaction

integration_steps.title: Test Integration
integration_steps.description: Test all contract functions through your frontend interface
